title: Third-Party Excavation Encroachment
description: A compliance manager receives an alert that unauthorized excavation is occurring near a high-pressure gas pipeline right-of-way.

tasks.description: Receive and verify the GPS coordinates of the encroachment alert from the monitoring system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The location of the unauthorized activity is confirmed on a map.

tasks.description: Cross-reference the location with the 'Call Before You Dig' (811) ticket database to see if a request was filed.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system confirms no active 811 ticket exists for that location.

tasks.description: Dispatch a pipeline technician immediately to the site to halt the excavation and assess the situation.
tasks.expected_outcome: A technician is dispatched with high priority to prevent a potential pipeline strike.
